2081350.name: Summoner Tale
2081350.description:
Summoner Tale is an Action RPG that redefines monster-taming with new, immersive way. Play a young summoner on a perilous journey to uncover hidden truths and restore balance. Befriend and command powerful monsters, harness their unique abilities, and forge unbreakable bonds as you build your ultimate squad. Battle through a world on the brink, where every encounter shapes your destiny!

A Tale of Betrayal and Redemption

Monsters and men, bound by destiny and divided by war. In a world where loyalty is tested and legends are rewritten, one journey will determine the fate of all.

Unique Monsters

Unleash powerful monsters, each with a unique ability! Monsters are divided into four classes:

  • Companions: Follow and fight beside you until their energy runs out.

  • Attackers: Appear briefly to unleash devastating attacks.

  • Supporters: Provide instant support with special skills, then vanish.

  • Enhancers: Give you new mobility options and special enhancements to conquer your journey.

Tame Monsters In Many Ways

Monster taming is more dynamic than ever! Battle fierce challengers, race speedy rivals, gather rare items, or complete unique tasks to recruit new allies.

Level Up & Evolve

Battle alongside your monsters, level them up, and unlock their true potential as they evolve into even more powerful forms!

Development

Stay updated on Summoner Tale! Fresh content, progress insights, and weekly sneak peeks shared on bsky @negmworld.bsky.social‬. Follow along and join the journey!
